评论详情: Comfortable and soft.
Well made Comfortable
My wife loved it. Nice and heavy and warm
I love this robe! It’s long, thick, and comfortable! It’s super easy to clean and adds an extra luxurious feeling after a pampered bath!

This robe is a cozy, warm way to wrap up after a shower! The material is thick and snuggly, somewhat softer than a standard bath towel.  Not quite as luxurious as the waffle robes you get at a spa, but it's still a good robe for home/everyday and definitely beats wrapping up in only a towel. The length of the robe, sleeves, and belt all feel just about right and I like that it has big pockets. One thing to note -- even completely dry, this robe is pretty heavy (part of why it is so warm and snuggly). Because of the weight of the fabric, it needs to be hung on a sturdy hook or hanger, especially when it is wet. I had a not-so-sturdy older "command" hook on the back of my bathroom door -- the robe was too heavy for it and the hook fell down. Since then, I hang this robe on a hook that is screwed to a stud so I don't have to worry about it falling or pulling away.

评论概述: Feels like a motel towel, not in a good way
评论详情: The description is very deceiving.  This robe is not plush, soft, velour, absorbent or one size fits most.  It is white, they got that correct.  This robe is extremely disappointing.

Talk about fancy. This feels premium the minute you slap it on. Throw it in the dryer for a few minutes and feel the warmth give you a cloud hug that will make you feel like you're in heaven. Worth every penny. Gorgeous feel and premium quality cotton.

评论概述: decent quality, very soft and comfortable
评论详情: This robe is size M/L, but more towards M for a very comfortable use. The belt is different from  what pictures show, it doesn't have enforced stitches across the length. The belt loop fell off after the first use. It is on the thinner side, but very comfortable and soft. It is alright quality, but I have had better ones and this could be a good guest bathrobe.

I could definitely imagine a softer robe than this.. it does kind of have cheap towel vibes, but, even so, it is really nice to get out of a hot bath, slip into this, and just relax while you finish drying off.  My robe did come with a belt loop on each side, and it works well enough.  It does not have an inner string, though, so the only thing holding it closed is the outer belt.  Might not want to go running through a communal area in this, but for around the house, it's perfectly fine.
This robe is great it reminds of of hotel bath robe. It’s very comfortable, nice length. Its absorbent. I like the material, strong.

This feels like a spa robe. The cotton is very absorbent and this item is well made. It's not very long but definitely works to dry off quickly. I love wearing this after a shower or bath - it washes and dries very well too.

We ordered a sauna for the house and that prompted me to get something to wear on the trips to and from. I really like the way this fit and the softness. The robe also feels well made. I look forward to wearing it regularly.
Really good for guest rooms.  I recommend.
Very well made, comfy, nice quality.  it's a one size fits all and I'm a bigger guy (5'11/275) so its a bit too small for me, but my best friend was happy to take it off myhands!

I have been looking for a robe ever since I started using them at spa’s and this one is comparable. I actually liked that it was a little softer than some I have tired before and I loved that the size covered me at 5 ft 8 inch it was about 6 inches off the floor which I found to be a great length. Another robe I have fit way to small and this one was a great size. I also loved that it closed with a little extra room and I’m not exactly super thin but also not too large and it fit me well. I loved that the robe came with two loops and the basic belt to tie in front. I also liked that it had two pockets for carrying your phone or keys or whatever you like.  I did find it a little thinner than some I have used at spa’s but it still covers everything it needs too so not a huge deal. It also had a funny smell right out of the package which isn’t a huge deal. Overall I really liked it and will definitely be using this robe.

This robe is so soft! It's not thin but not too thick. I feel it can be used year round. I currently switch robes with seasons but this cotton robe will be great all year. I am 5'8" and it goes about 5" past my knees. The sleeves are long and to my wrist. I am plus size, it doesn't have a lot of extra room, but does fir comfortably. I will not be drying it as it is 100% cotton and may not fit if I was to dry it in the dryer. Also, says not to bleach so this will be a struggle for me but hopefully not an issue.

评论概述: Feels like wearing a cheap towel
评论详情: I appreciate the length! I’m 5’3 so this is wonderfully long on me. The adjustable belt loops on the sides are a very nice detail. Being 100% cotton I expected a soft thick t-shirt feeling. It feels like a cheap towel.

评论概述: Love it!  This is the robe that I have been looking for!
评论详情: I have soft and plushy robes that aren't absorbent.  I have a towel-like robe, that's fine, but short.  I finally hit the sweet spot with this one. Large and long enough, and absorbent.  So, I can exit the bathroom without holding a towel, without worrying if the drapes are open at night, while keeping warmer than with a towel... and all the while, it's absorbing moisture and I'm getting dry.

The only thing “spa” about this robe is that it is white and terrycloth. It’s much thinner than I expected and lacks the “fluff” of a true spa robe. It might poof up a bit if I wash and dry it but then I run the risk of it shrinking. It’s still ok for whatever you’d use a robe for, just not soa quality.

This is a very soft, one-size-fits-all robe.  I was a bit wary about getting a robe that comes in only one size, but it fit beautifully. It's a heavier weight (which I like), almost like walking around in a very absorbent blanket.  The pockets are fairly deep as well.  It was not monogrammed.

The material is soft and heavy, the inside texture is similar to terrycloth towel, the outside has shorter velour type loops. It has a neck loop to hang the robe, 2 belt loops, a belt, and 2 pockets. It fits well and is very comfortable. It is good as a bathrobe, for pools or beaches, spas and saunas, for retreats and hotels, and for relaxing at home especially when it's a bit cold.
I like this 100% cotton bath robe. The robe is high-quality and well-made. It’s so soft and absorbent too. The robe is comfortable to wear and is perfect for a spa day.

评论概述: I feel like I'm at the spa
评论详情: Upon opening the package, I was struck with a strong mildew smell. That's ok, I have every intention of washing it. But, be aware...don't gift this directly to someone because of that. Anyhow, the size is good. For reference, I'm 5'6 and 160# and have plenty of room. My husband is 240#, and it's not generous enough for him. I like the length falling halfway from knee to foot. The sleeve length is also nice - not quite 3/4...a little longer, but it doesn't interfere with what I'm doing with my hands. The fabric is super soft and absorbent. There are two large pockets, too.

评论概述: Relaxed and Comfy with my new robe!
评论详情: Beyond pleased with my new Ben Kaufman robe! Arrived just as advertised.  Zero complaints here.  This robe provides awesome coverage.  It is well made. Although it is lightweight. It is NOT sheer. Doesn't feel cheap.  Made of 100% Cotton.  Because of this, the robe is breathable and moisture-absorbent. Which is what you are looking for. The exterior feels ultra soft and the inner towel-like lining was equally as impressive.  Felt lovely on the skin.  Not stiff nor harsh at all.  Just like the robes at the spa, this robe has the long length I was looking for.  On my 5'5 frame, the robe was almost above my ankles.  I was able to adjust the belt to my liking as it has two loops to choose from. Any gender will be pleased. I would recommend 👌

评论概述: Always wanted a hotel quality robe
评论详情: Very soft and plush. I always wanted a hotel quality robe. I did find stating it is a Monogrammed Shawl Collar was a bit cheeky as the monogram on it is, I am sure, the initials of the designer, who ever KG is. But nonetheless, the price is equal to that of a hotel robe. Plush and pricey. I do recommend this robe for anyone who wants to feel special, I know it does for me.

评论概述: It is like having a full body cheap towel in robe shape on you
评论详情: The ribe came in and instantly tried it out. A lot (I mean a lot of fuzzy and lint was coming off). For those in the US, imagine a Walmart cheap towel and imagine it being full body size and shaped like a robe - that is what this feels like.  I read other reviews and saw people saying no belt loops for the belt sash but this had them. They were so high up though, just about middle of my chest. I am about 5' 9.5".  It felt very cheap but I don't mind too much. The inside has some type of tighter stitching but feels more like it was designed for something else. My towels for my car feel nicer.  Do not get me wrong, it does feel like a cheap towel but also feels very absorbent also. I think it will be nice to wear from the bathroom to the bedroom without having to worry if a window is open.

Made of a nice thick fabric, soft plush velour on the outside and absorbent looped terry on the inside. A nice touch is the dual beltloop feature, one set directly above the other, so you can tie the robe closed at your natural waistline, wherever that may be.

评论概述: For a Terry Robe, its soft
评论详情: We really like this terry robe.  We don't usually like terry robes, butt this is softer than most.  My wife is 5' 1" and the robe, while long, still is wearable.  On a taller person it would be fine.  The sleeves are quite wide.
I love this robe. I’ve been looking for years for a quality terry robe. I love how cozy and warm it feels. Excellent quality ❤️

评论概述: No way to keep the robe tie in place, no belt loops
评论详情: The robe is nice quality however it arrives in sketchy packaging, the robe has no belt loops to keep the tie in place.
Good overall
These robes make you feel like your in the Ritz Carlton.  Customer services were outstanding,  for resolving an issue.  I ordered two of them so nice .
